results.content:
At first I was not sure how I felt about this course. I have had some programming issues that I am working around, but I was pleasantly surprised. This was a very enjoyable lesson and I believe the more I learn, the more I understand. I will be very happy if I can ever get to the point where I can just write without having to research or take notes !!
Thank you for this course and all of the rest you have done, They may be a bit challenging on a couple so far, but they have been very informative and engaging. I appreciate the time you have taken with the lessons!

response.content: Thanks for sharing your review and feedback, glad you enjoyed the course.
response.content_html: Thanks for sharing your review and feedback, glad you enjoyed the course.

results.content: The course was wonderful.  The example app created was realistic and can be easily adapted.  It did help having a very good background in using Google Apps Script however if a beginner takes this course they will just go through it at slower pace.

response.content: Thank you Michael for posting your review and feedback
response.content_html: Thank you Michael for posting your review and feedback

results.content_html: The course was wonderful. The example app created was realistic and can be easily adapted. It did help having a very good background in using Google Apps Script however if a beginner takes this course they will just go through it at slower pace.

results.content:
Very enlightening, this was my first foray in to google apps script. I have intermediate knowledge of HTML, CSS and JavaScript and I found this course to be very accessible.

Highly recommended course for those of you looking to build and deploy your first functioning web app. 

My only feedback for the instructor  is actually rather minor.  to perhaps  slow down during portions where he is accessing the Google Apps Script reference pages  it was rather difficult to follow along -

As a suggestion or area to add further value: Id love to hear a few tips and recommendations for the various services he uses the most. 

Thanks Laurence! I will sign up to another one of your courses again in the future!

response.content: Thank you for your review Happy coding :)
response.content_html: Thank you for your review Happy coding :)

results.content:
I enjoyed the course and learned a bunch. I liked he simple he made everything look, but I would have benefited from a more detailed explanation for much of the code. I really liked that he demonstrated how he uses the knowledge base and documentation to help build the project.  

I think he could improve by developing the project a bit more to make it resemble a real world project. More commenting in the final source could would go a long way to helping students use/tweak the code. 

Lastly, I'd like to see a more dynamic method for selecting spreadsheets, document, etc... in the code so the app would be more flexible.

response.content: Awesome thank you for your review and feedback :)
response.content_html: Awesome thank you for your review and feedback :)

results.content:
I've already used GAS bound to Google documents so some of this certainly wasn't new to me.  This will be a great resource for me to reference when starting a Google docs web app.  Laurence showed just how easy it is to take my experience to the next level and build projects with broader scope.  More importantly to me, he did it quickly without a lot of explaining and jabbering.  He leaves it to you to watch the lecture again or find other resources on things you may not be comfortable with yet which kept him on topic and moved the material along at a nice pace.

Laurence, thank you for sharing your work.

response.content: Thank you for your review and feedback
response.content_html: Thank you for your review and feedback
